page.title: 07Religion
page.content: The three main denominations of{ {RELIGION}are catered for by the presence of four churches in the area. { Bellie Church of Scotland}is on the South side of the square and a service is conducted each Sunday morning and occasionally also in the evening.There is a Sunday School and a Youth Fellowship for the younger adherants and a Young Womans Group and a Guild for adult female members.The minister, the Rev.David Ferguson serves also in the Speymouth parish with services in the{RED KIRK}. In the{CATHOLIC CHAPEL}in South Street Father Hanley holds Mass each morning and a service on Sunday. The{EPISCOPAL CHURCH}close to the Gordon Castle grounds,has a small thriving congregation under the care of Canon Lunn. There are often united services.
